mapper.sql: roleID, roleName, createTime, description, isCheck, status, type, colum1, colum2, colum3, colum4, colum5
mapper.select: select r.*,p.powerid,p.powername,p.url,p.description as descrip from role r left join rolePower rp on r.roleid = rp.roleid left join power p on rp.powerid = p. powerid where r.roleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into role
roleID,
roleName,
createTime,
description,
isCheck,
status,
type,
colum1,
colum2,
colum3,
colum4,
colum5,

mapper.update:
update role
roleName = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isCheck = #{ischeck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
colum1 = #{colum1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
colum2 = #{colum2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
colum3 = #{colum3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
colum4 = #{colum4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
colum5 = #{colum5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where roleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update role set roleName = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isCheck = #{ischeck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colum1 = #{colum1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colum2 = #{colum2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colum3 = #{colum3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colum4 = #{colum4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colum5 = #{colum5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where roleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
